name: NETFLIX Wild Things
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Rescue cute animals, explore an immersive world and build your dream habitat in this colorful match-3 adventure game.

Help best friends Liam the Lion and Emma the Elephant rebuild their homes and revive their animal friends after a terrible storm. Play challenging match-3 puzzles, design and renovate the animal habitats, take care of cute critters and uncover the mystery behind the storm.

Solve match-3 puzzles to rescue animals and restore the environment. Unlock your animal friends’ epic powers to blast through tons of levels and bring order to the Wildlands.

• Renovate the environment and give the habitats a complete makeover.
• Design every building, home and town.
• Decorate gardens, jungles, houses and other parts of the game world.
• Rescue cute animals with big personalities.
• Discover fun in-game interactions with the animals.
• Use each animal's unique ability to blast through tough puzzles.
• Customize your Wild Things with unique costumes.
